networkDesc: SDSN South Africa is a community of universities, research centers, and other knowledge institutions to translate the latest expertise in sustainable development into action.
networkVision: The SDSN South Africa Network exists to mobilise and support efforts towards accelerated achievement of the country’s National Development Plan, Agenda 2063, and the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

networkObjectives.header: Education and research translate into practical, innovative and transformational solutions
The network’s contribution to accelerated achievement of the NDP and SDGs is demonstrated.

networkImpact:
What we will look like:

In fulfilling our purpose and achieving our goals:

networkMetrics.header: We are actively engaged with stakeholders and collaborate at multiple levels
Our partnerships are vibrant, nurturing creativity and innovation
Our sense of humanity is palpable, and the philosophy of mutual benefit is the norm – we have set the tone for reimagining the role of institutions in society.
